title: An up-to-date review on the progress and challenges of hydrogen storage, and its safety and economic analysis
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3545-3573
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00281D, Review Article
M. A. Sattar, M. G. Rasul, M. I. Jahirul, M. M. Hasan
The demand for hydrogen is increasing every year and is expected to increase in the future which necessitates the establishment of safe storage of hydrogen for the end user.
